item.name: üîê User Authentication (5 endpoints)
item.description: Core user authentication: register, login, join organization, refresh token, logout

request.description:
**üîê Register a new user account**

üìã **Request Body Schema:**
```json
{
  "email": "string",         // Valid email (required)
  "password": "string",      // Min 8 chars (required)
  "full_name": "string",     // User's full name (required)
  "role": "user|org_member|org_admin|tenant_admin|super_admin", // Default: user
  "join_token": "string"     // Optional: for joining organization
}
```

‚úÖ **Success Response (201):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "User registered successfully",
  "user": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "email": "admin@hdfcbank.com",
    "full_name": "HDFC Bank Admin",
    "role": "super_admin",
    "is_active": true,
    "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

‚ùå **Error Responses:**
- 400: Email already registered
- 422: Validation error (invalid email, weak password)

**üîê Authenticate user and receive access token**

üìã **Request Body Schema:**
```json
{
  "email": "string",        // User email (required)
  "password": "string"      // User password (required)
}
```

‚úÖ **Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...",
  "token_type": "bearer",
  "expires_in": 3600,
  "user": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "email": "admin@hdfcbank.com",
    "full_name": "HDFC Bank Admin",
    "role": "super_admin",
    "organization_id": "uuid",
    "tenant_id": "uuid",
    "is_active": true
  }
}
```

‚ùå **Error Responses:**
- 401: Invalid credentials
- 403: Account deactivated

**üè¢ Join organization using join token** (Requires authentication)

üìã **Request Body Schema:**
```json
{
  "join_token": "string"    // Valid organization join token (required)
}
```

‚úÖ **Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Successfully joined organization",
  "user": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "email": "user@hdfcbank.com",
    "organization_id": "uuid",
    "organization_role": "member"
  },
  "access_token": "updated_jwt_token",
  "token_type": "bearer"
}
```

‚ùå **Error Responses:**
- 400: Invalid join token
- 401: Authentication required
- 409: Already member of organization

**üîÑ Refresh access token using refresh token**

üìã **Request Body Schema:**
```json
{
  "refresh_token": "string"  // Valid refresh token (required)
}
```

‚úÖ **Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "access_token": "new_jwt_token_here",
  "token_type": "bearer",
  "expires_in": 3600,
  "refresh_token": "new_refresh_token_here"
}
```

‚ùå **Error Responses:**
- 401: Invalid or expired refresh token

**üö™ Logout user and invalidate token** (Requires authentication)

‚úÖ **Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Successfully logged out"
}
```

‚ùå **Error Responses:**
- 401: Authentication required

item.name: üîß Admin Authentication (5 endpoints)
item.description: Super admin and tenant admin endpoints for user management, impersonation, and auditing

exec: console.log('‚úÖ Created User ID set:', response.user.id);

request.description:
**üë• Create user account (Admin only)** - Requires admin role

üîí **Authorization:** super_admin, tenant_admin, or org_admin

üìã **Request Body Schema:**
```json
{
  "email": "string",         // Valid email (required)
  "password": "string",      // Min 8 chars (required)
  "full_name": "string",     // User's full name (required)
  "first_name": "string",    // Optional: First name
  "last_name": "string",     // Optional: Last name
  "username": "string",      // Optional: Custom username
  "global_role": "user|org_member|org_admin|tenant_admin|super_admin",
  "organization_role": "member|admin|owner", // Optional
  "organization_id": "uuid", // Optional: Organization assignment
  "tenant_id": "uuid",       // Optional: Tenant assignment
  "is_active": boolean        // Default: true
}
```

‚úÖ **Success Response (201):**
```json
{
  "user": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "email": "newuser@hdfcbank.com",
    "username": "hdfc_newuser",
    "full_name": "New HDFC User",
    "global_role": "user",
    "organization_role": "member",
    "organization_id": "uuid",
    "tenant_id": "uuid",
    "is_active": true,
    "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  },
  "message": "User created successfully"
}
```

**üé≠ Impersonate another user** - Requires super_admin role

üîí **Authorization:** super_admin only

üìã **Path Parameters:**
- `user_id` (string): UUID of the user to impersonate

‚úÖ **Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "access_token": "impersonation_jwt_token",
  "token_type": "bearer",
  "expires_in": 3600,
  "impersonated_user": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "email": "user@hdfcbank.com",
    "full_name": "Target User",
    "role": "user"
  },
  "impersonator": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "email": "admin@hdfcbank.com",
    "full_name": "Admin User"
  }
}
```

**üîí Force password reset for any user** - Requires admin role

üîí **Authorization:** admin role required

üìã **Request Body Schema:**
```json
{
  "new_password": "string", // New password (min 8 chars)
  "notify_user": boolean     // Whether to send email notification
}
```

‚úÖ **Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Password reset successfully",
  "user_id": "uuid",
  "notification_sent": true
}
```

**üìä Get login history for specific user** - Requires admin role

üîí **Authorization:** admin role required

üìã **Query Parameters:**
- `limit` (integer): Number of records (default: 50)
- `offset` (integer): Records to skip (default: 0)

‚úÖ **Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "user_id": "uuid",
  "total_logins": 25,
  "history": [
    {
      "login_time": "2024-01-01T10:00:00Z",
      "ip_address": "192.168.1.1",
      "user_agent": "Mozilla/5.0...",
      "success": true,
      "location": "Mumbai, India",
      "device_type": "desktop"
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "limit": 50,
    "offset": 0,
    "total": 25
  }
}
```

**‚ö° Activate or deactivate multiple users** - Requires admin role

üîí **Authorization:** admin role required

üìã **Request Body Schema:**
```json
{
  "user_ids": ["uuid1", "uuid2"], // Array of user IDs
  "activate": boolean,             // true=activate, false=deactivate
  "send_notification": boolean    // Send email notifications
}
```

‚úÖ **Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Bulk operation completed",
  "processed": 3,
  "successful": 3,
  "failed": 0,
  "results": [
    {
      "user_id": "uuid1",
      "status": "success",
      "message": "User activated successfully"
    }
  ]
}
```
